comment._content: Wow that's interesting, no camera obscura, no cliff railway and the old houses at the very end of the seafront are still standing!   Also that last but one block doesn't look right (at this distance) to be Alexandra Hall, I wonder if they predate it ?

comment.author: 94482242@N00
comment._content: This photo must also pre-date 1895 as Alexandra Hall hasn't been constructed yet.
